components.name: security
components.description:
Authenticates requests
 Properties: <keysDir> Directory with key material, defaults to colocated with ca_methods.js (i.e., <app_root>/lib). 
<serviceURL> External service to create tokens. 
 <trustedPubKeyFile> Trusted public key to verify signed tokens. 
 <privateKeyFile> Optional private key to sign tokens. 
 <pubKeyFile> Optional public key for signing key. 
 <unrestricted> True, if this application requires a token that can be used with other applications.
 <appPublisher> Name of the app publisher.
 <appLocalName> Local name app given by the app publisher.
 <allowNobodyUser> Enable the user 'nobody' to bypass authentication
